TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Toolset extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 MSBuild 中的工具組。
如需工具組的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準和自訂工具組的組態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15a048c8-5ad3-448e-b6e9-e3c5d7147ed2)。

span.span: For more information about Toolsets, see [Standard and Custom Toolset Configurations](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/15a048c8-5ad3-448e-b6e9-e3c5d7147ed2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件都有對應`ToolsVersion`值代表的值，這個值`ToolsVersion`屬性[專案項目 (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653)以及`ToolsPath`值，指出工具組的位置位於。A object has a corresponding `ToolsVersion` value that represents the value of the `ToolsVersion` attribute on the [Project Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1cda56a-dbef-4109-9201-39e962e3f653) as well as a `ToolsPath` value that indicates where the Toolset is located.

MemberSignature.Value: public Toolset (string toolsVersion, string toolsPath);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string toolsVersion, string toolsPath) cil managed
Public Sub New (toolsVersion As String, toolsPath As String)
public: Toolset(System::String ^ toolsVersion, System::String ^ toolsPath);

param.name: toolsVersion
param.span: 字串，代表目前正在使用的 版本。

span.span: A string representing the version of the currently in use.

param.name: toolsPath
param.span: 字串，代表目前正在使用的 路徑。

span.span: A string representing the path to the currently in use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **ArgumentNullException**任一個參數值時，會擲回錯誤`null`。An **ArgumentNullException** error is thrown if either parameter value is `null`. **ArgumentException**無效的引數的值，例如空字串會擲回錯誤。An **ArgumentException** error is thrown for invalid argument values such as empty strings.

span.span: A string representing the version of the currently in use.

param.name: toolsPath
param.span: 字串，代表目前正在使用的 路徑。

span.span: A string representing the path to the currently in use.

param.name: buildProperties
param.span: 字串，代表 特有的自訂屬性。

span.span: A string representing the -specific custom properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **ArgumentNullException**任何參數值時，會擲回錯誤`null`。An **ArgumentNullException** error is thrown if any of the parameter values are `null`. **ArgumentException**無效的引數的值，例如空字串會擲回錯誤。An **ArgumentException** error is thrown for invalid argument values such as empty strings.
